articles.title: Tom Holland Is Hosting a Marvel Pub Quiz. Thank You, World - The Mary Sue
articles.description: Ever dreamt of doing a pub quiz with Tom Holland? Well your time is here and it is Marvel themed!
articles.content: Tom Holland has been trying to bring joy to the world in whatever little ways he can, which we appreciate. Whether it’s buying chickens and sharing it with us on Instagram or doing weird challenges where he tries to put his shirt on while doing a handstand, h… [+3612 chars]

articles.description: Mikey, Brand, Mouth, Chunk, Data, Andy, Stef - the Goonies were reunited for a charity livestream event during COVID-19 lockdown.

articles.title: Ed Sheeran refuses to furlough bar staff during coronavirus pandemic - NME
articles.description: Ed Sheeran has supported staff at his London bar by refusing to furlough them during the coronavirus crisis
articles.content:
Ed Sheeran has supported staff at his London bar by refusing to furlough them during the coronavirus crisis.
The singer is a part owner of the Notting Hill haunt Bertie Blossoms, alongside longtime manager Stuart Camp.
Despite closing its doors in March to … [+1157 chars]

articles.author: Rachel McGrath
articles.title: Britain’s Got Talent: 12-year-old Fayth Ifil wins Simon Cowell’s golden buzzer with Proud Mary performance - Evening Standard
articles.description: The young singer stunned the judges
articles.content:
A 12-year-old singer became the latest person to go straight through to the Britains Got Talent semi-finals on Saturday. 
Fayth Ifil wowed the judges with her performance of Tina Turners iconic track Proud Mary. 
Arriving on stage, she had told the panel ab… [+2046 chars]
